title: Is anyone else
body: As excited as I am for Poro King?

replies.body:
It's gonna be like any other new game mode.

Fun for the first day, then everyone will just go tryhard OP champs and it will be boring as %%%%.

I was this exited then i logged on this morning to find nothing new, so i thought to myself "ok lets play an aram while i wait for it to be released," i started the game, the championselect screen bugged out and held me in it for 10 min, after i finally managed to quit Lol i restarted managed to join the game, played the last 10 min of it then got a leaver buster warning.... 

and still no Poro king

Gives {{item:3060}} to Poro King.

It becomes %%%%ing huge.
I guess it is hard to match my excitement.
